column5: Looking for a place to eat in Brugges, Belgium, and found this place, Den Gouden Karpel ("the good carp").    I didn't order carp (at least not on purpose), but the rest of the menu was really good. Excellent fish and lobster chowder.  I skipped the calamari though ... it looked too much like deep fried carp lips.  MJL, you would love this place!
What kinda wine do you  recommend with carp lips Craig
Love Brugge. Had a great meal at this place last time I was there. http://www.pieterpourbus.com/
Can I set up my rod pod and bite alarms in the kitchen to catch my dinner?

Abasolutely! The restaurant is located near a canal, where there were a bunch of people set up with rod stands, catapaults, the whole works. They take carp fishing seriously there.  And nope, the restaurant doesn't likely get its fish that way. It's almost 100% C&R from what I gather.
"Carp Lips"........There just not for breakfast...anymore  Nice side order of blue/green algae....your good for the day
Good place to eat and good place to do a little carpin'.  If I went to Belgium, I stay there the whole time!!  Thanks for posting that Craig.  Hope you're enjoying yourself over there!
Mmmmm carp lips, lightly dusted in flour and deep fried.  Enjoy Belgium, would love to go there.
I was in Ostend Belgium once or twice while  in the Navy, but I sure as heck didn't dine on any carp LOL
Did they have Sea Lamprey on the menu? I hear its a delicacy.
